PageWidgetPortable.Title: Canceladas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_PR_ORDENSPRODUCAO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>((A.STATUS=5) AND (A.FILIAL IN(SELECT B.FILIAL FROM PR_PARAMETROS B WHERE B.UTILIZAUP = 'N') OR (A.FAMILIA IN(SELECT C.HANDLE FROM PD_FAMILIASPRODUTOS C WHERE C.UPAREA IN(SELECT D.AREA FROM UP_AREAINTEGRANTES D WHERE D.USUARIO = @USUARIO)))))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1835_at2021_hse6ebe34e.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
